title: I've earn't 2 s grades or higher on velkoz and i haven't  received any mastery tokens.
body: i really am pissed that i havent been given my tokens riot

replies.body: Are you M5 or 6 with Vel? If you are Mastery 6 (earning M7 tokens) then S- grades will not get you tokens, only S and S+.

Can you explain this a bit further im confused, 
And does that mean some characters are different to others? 
How can i tell?

I get M3 on Nidalee and win S- and her loot crate.

-M4 on Lux and S and her loot crate.

-M4 on Kassadin S+ and i get NOTHING :(

Mastery tokens aren't the same as chests. Mastery tokens are what you use to upgrade from Mastery 5 to 6, and then 6 to 7. You earn M6 token by getting any S grade on a champ you are M5 on. M7 is the same deal but you have to be M6 and the grade has to be S or S+.

Earning chests is a bit different. You earn chests when you or someone in your premade gets an S grade, but there's a bit more to it.

First off you must have a chest available, you get one available every week and can have up to 4 available at a time. 
Second, you can only earn one chest per champion per season, so if you've already earned a chest on say, Kassadin, you won't receive another one even if you get an S.
Third is you can't be loot restricted, but this one's pretty obvious since it tells you at the end of every game if you are. (You get loot restricted from recent punishments like chat restrictions).
